pages.title: Kamen Rider Habataki
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Hibiki And The 7 Senki (2005, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:hibiki/devices/ongekimei#habatakidriver)Ongekimei$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Resistance$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste$(li)Fire Resistance$(li)Strength II
